quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因“land”（土地）+“scape”（景色）的字面联想将“landscaping”误解为“土地自然景色”，或因形近词混淆为“着陆”（landing），忽略其“园林设计”的核心义。
quiz_item.sentence: The new residential community hired a company to do the **landscaping** around the buildings, including planting trees and setting up flower beds.

option.definition: 园林设计；景观美化工作
